Participants , age 6-16 , consult homeopathic practitioner select treatment base classical homeopathy principle . All participant assess 4-weekly basis total 36 week . The purpose study assess feasibility recruitment patient retention , obtain pilot data base sample size calculation future study , identify major safety concern . The study use single homeopathic medicine approve over-the-counter use Canada . The primary outcome measure validate Conners 3rd Edition - Parent .
